report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts by Taxon Group
report.description: Lists taxon groups and the number of species and occurrences within them.
report.query: SELECT tg.title as taxongroup, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl2 ON ttl2.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id and ttl2.preferred='t' AND ttl2.deleted=false JOIN taxa t ON ttl2.taxon_id = t.id AND t.deleted=false JOIN taxon_groups tg ON t.taxon_group_id = tg.id AND tg.deleted=false WHERE #website_filter# AND o.deleted=false GROUP BY taxongroup UNION SELECT 'Total' as taxongroup, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND ttl.deleted=false WHERE #website_filter# AND o.deleted=false AND o.deleted=false
